name: Arial for Roblox v1.4
description:
This style just changes the Roblox font to Arial
Fully compatible with both light and dark themes.
additional_info:
Changelog:
v1.4 : Titles are now in the original font weight
v1.3 : Fixed Style
v1.2 : Almost everything is now Arial
v1.1.1 : Fixed a bug where games would be positioned in the left
v1.1 : Fixed bottom footer sizing up when style activated (only on some sites)
v1.0 : Initial release
